thread.name: Re: Bank of Montreal - Termination Transactions

email.subject: Re: Bank of Montreal - Termination Transactions

text.sentence: Peter, Mark took a look at your termination and he thought it looked fine.
Actually, he liked your termination and release better than the language we have in our form, so we're changing our form.
I checked the New York law when I drafted the termination so you're ok there.
I'll be out all next week, my Mom's coming into town for the Thanksgiving holidays.
If you need to get hold of me my assistant will have my cell phone number (since it's NYMEX bid week and both Mark and I will be out, I have to be reachable.
Mark will have an international cell phone with him, he's sailing in the Caribbean, so if you need to get hold of him for any reason, Taffy will have the number).
Let me know if I can be of further help today!
